title: Update Angular
contents:
mode_edit

更新 Angularlink

Update Angularlink

本指南包含更新到 Angular 版本 14 的資訊。

This guide contains information to update to Angular version 14.

更新 Angular CLI 應用程式link

Update Angular CLI applicationslink

有關如何更新到最新的 Angular 版本和利用 Angular 自動遷移工具的分步說明，請使用 update.angular.io 上的互動式更新指南。

For step-by-step instructions on how to update to the latest Angular release and leverage the Angular automated migration tools, use the interactive update guide at update.angular.io.

版本 14 中的更改與棄用link

Changes and deprecations in version 14link

有關 Angular 的棄用和刪除實踐的資訊，請參閱Angular 釋出實踐。

For information about the deprecation and removal practices of Angular, see Angular Release Practices.

  • 嚴格型別的響應式表單

    響應式表單型別 AbstractControl 、 FormControl 、 FormGroup 和 FormArray 現在支援一個泛型引數，該引數允許對控制項進行嚴格鍵入。自動遷移會將這些型別的現有用法轉換為特殊的 Untyped 別名，以保留現有行為。

    FormControl 構造的 initialValueIsDefault 選項已被棄用，以支援 nonNullable 選項（具有相同的行為）。這種重新命名使 FormControl 建構函式與其他與可空性相關的嚴格型別 API 保持一致。

    Strictly Typed Reactive Forms

    The Reactive Forms types AbstractControl, FormControl, FormGroup, and FormArray now support a generic parameter which allows for strict typing of the controls. An automatic migration will convert existing usages of these types to special Untyped aliases which preserve the existing behavior.

    The initialValueIsDefault option for FormControl construction has been deprecated in favor of the nonNullable option (which has identical behavior). This renaming aligns the FormControl constructor with other strictly typed APIs related to nullability.

  • ComponentFactory 和 NgModuleFactory 清理

    許多使用 ComponentFactory 或 NgModuleFactory 的 API 已被棄用，並替換為直接使用元件或 NgModule 類別的新 API。

    ComponentFactory and NgModuleFactory cleanup

    Many APIs which use either ComponentFactory or NgModuleFactory have been deprecated and replaced with new APIs that use component or NgModule classes directly.

Angular 版本 14 中的重大更改link

Breaking changes in Angular version 14link

詳情

Details
PR #45729

initialNavigation: 'enabled' 在 v11 中已棄用，並由 initialNavigation: 'enabledBlocking'. 代替.

initialNavigation: 'enabled' was deprecated in v11 and is replaced by initialNavigation: 'enabledBlocking'..
PR #42803

表單 email 輸入強制：如果表單 email 輸入值是使用任何值而不是 false 和 'false' 定義的，則將被視為 true。

Forms email input coercion: forms email input value will be considered as true if it is defined with any value rather than false and 'false'.
PR #33729

長度鍵設定為零的物件將不再驗證為空。從技術上講，這是一個突破性更改，因為鍵 length 和值為 0 的物件將不再驗證為空。這是一個非常小的更改，無論如何，對此行為的任何依賴都可能是一個錯誤。

Objects with a length key set to zero will no longer validate as empty. This is technically a breaking change, since objects with a key length and value 0 will no longer validate as empty. This is a very minor change, and any reliance on this behavior is probably a bug anyway.
PR #44921

載入 Hammer 時不要執行變更檢測。此更改可能會導致在特定數字上隱含斷言的單元測試或變更檢測的順序失敗。

Do not run change detection when loading Hammer. This change may cause unit tests that are implicitly asserting on the specific number or the ordering of change detections to fail.
PR #23020

TransferState 使用的引數型別提高了型別安全性，這可能會揭示現有的有問題的呼叫。

Parameter types of TransferState usage have increased type safety, and this may reveal existing problematic calls.
PR #43863

Navigation#initialUrl 的型別已從 string|UrlTree 縮小為 UrlTree，以反映現實。

The type of Navigation#initialUrl has been narrowed to UrlTree from `string
PR #45114

AnimationDriver.getParentElement 方法已成為必需，因此現在要求此介面的任何實現者提供此方法的實現。

The AnimationDriver.getParentElement method has become required, so any implementors of this interface are now required to provide an implementation for this method.
PR #45176

Route.pathMatch 的型別現在更嚴格。使用 pathMatch 的地方可能需要更新為顯式 Route / Routes 型別，以便 TypeScript 不會將型別推斷為 string。

The type of Route.pathMatch is now more strict. Places that use pathMatch will likely need to be updated to have an explicit Route/Routes type so that TypeScript does not infer the type as string.
PR #44573

路由器現在僅獲取解析器發出的第一個值，然後繼續導航。這現在與其他警衛返回的 Observables 一致：僅使用第一個值。

The router now takes only the first emitted value by the resolvers and then proceeds with navigation. This is now consistent with Observables returned by other guards: only the first value is used.
PR #45394

不再支援早於 4.6.0 的 TypeScript 版本。

TypeScript versions older than 4.6.0 are no longer supported.
PR #45210

在 JSONP 請求上設定標頭時，HttpClient 將丟擲錯誤。

HttpClient will throw an error when headers are set on a JSONP request.
PR #43834

響應式表單型別（例如 FormControl 和 FormGroup 現在具有泛型型別引數並推斷更嚴格的型別。遷移會將現有的用法轉換為新的 Untyped 字首的別名，以保留現有的行為。

Reactive form types such as FormControl and FormGroup now have generic type parameters and infer stricter types. A migration will convert existing usages to new Untyped-prefixed aliases which preserve the existing behavior.
PR #45487

TestBed 配置中已過時的 aotSummaries 欄位已刪除。

The deprecated aotSummaries field in the TestBed configuration has been removed.
PR #45648

添加了一個新的必需類成員 LocationStrategy#getState，此介面的任何實現者都需要提供。

A new required class member LocationStrategy#getState has been added, that any implementers of this interface will need to provide.
PR #45735

當守衛返回 UrlTree 時，以前路由器會在 setTimeout 內安排重新導向導航。現在刪除了此超時，這可能會由於測試編寫不正確而導致測試失敗。

When a guard returns a UrlTree, the router would previously schedule the redirect navigation within a setTimeout. This timeout is now removed, which can result in test failures due to incorrectly written tests.

新的棄用link

New deprecationslink

已移除

Removed

替代品

Replacement

詳情

Details
FormControlOptions#initialValueIsDefault FormControlOptions#nonNullable

FormControl 構造的 initialValueIsDefault 選項已被棄用，以支援 nonNullable 選項（具有相同的行為）。這種重新命名使 FormControl 建構函式與其他與可空性相關的嚴格型別 API 保持一致。

The initialValueIsDefault option for FormControl construction has been deprecated in favor of the nonNullable option (which has identical behavior). This renaming aligns the FormControl constructor with other strictly typed APIs related to nullability.

傳遞給TestRequest#error的 ErrorEvent

ErrorEvents passed to TestRequest#error

 ProgressEvent

Http 請求永遠不會發出 ErrorEvent。改用 ProgressEvent。

Http requests never emit an ErrorEvent. Use a ProgressEvent instead.
getModuleFactory getNgModuleById

NgModuleFactory 本身已被棄用。

NgModuleFactory itself is deprecated.
ModuleWithComponentFactories

不適用

n/a

Ivy JIT 模式不需要存取這個符號。有關其他上下文，請參閱由於 ViewEngine 棄用而導致的 JIT API 更改。

Ivy JIT mode doesn't require accessing this symbol. See JIT API changes due to ViewEngine deprecation for additional context.
Compiler

不適用

n/a

Ivy JIT 模式不需要存取這個符號。有關其他上下文，請參閱由於 ViewEngine 棄用而導致的 JIT API 更改。

Ivy JIT mode doesn't require accessing this symbol. See JIT API changes due to ViewEngine deprecation for additional context.
CompilerFactory

不適用

n/a

Ivy JIT 模式不需要存取這個符號。有關其他上下文，請參閱由於 ViewEngine 棄用而導致的 JIT API 更改。

Ivy JIT mode doesn't require accessing this symbol. See JIT API changes due to ViewEngine deprecation for additional context.
NgModuleFactory

不適用

n/a

此類主要是作為基於 ViewEngine 的 JIT API 的一部分，在 Ivy JIT 模式下不再需要。有關其他上下文，請參閱由於 ViewEngine 棄用而導致的 JIT API 更改。 Angular 提供了能直接接受 NgModule 類別的 API（例如PlatformRef.bootstrapModule和createNgModuleRef ），考慮切換到這些 API 而不再使用基於工廠的 API。

This class was mostly used as a part of ViewEngine-based JIT API and is no longer needed in Ivy JIT mode. See JIT API changes due to ViewEngine deprecation for additional context. Angular provides APIs that accept NgModule classes directly (such as PlatformRef.bootstrapModule and createNgModuleRef), consider switching to those APIs instead of using factory-based ones.
ComponentFactory

不適用

n/a

Angular 不再需要 ComponentFactory 。其他 API 允許直接使用元件類別。

Angular no longer requires ComponentFactorys. Other APIs allow Component classes to be used directly.
ComponentFactoryResolver

不適用

n/a

Angular 不再需要 ComponentFactory 。其他 API 允許直接使用元件類別。

Angular no longer requires ComponentFactorys. Other APIs allow Component classes to be used directly.

CompilerOptions中的 useJit 和 missingTranslation

useJit and missingTranslation in CompilerOptions

不適用

n/a

Ivy JIT 模式不支援這些選項。有關其他上下文，請參閱由於 ViewEngine 棄用而導致的 JIT API 更改。

Ivy JIT mode does not support these options. See JIT API changes due to ViewEngine deprecation for additional context.
JitCompilerFactory

不適用

n/a

Ivy JIT 模式不需要存取這個符號。有關其他上下文，請參閱由於 ViewEngine 棄用而導致的 JIT API 更改。

Ivy JIT mode doesn't require accessing this symbol. See JIT API changes due to ViewEngine deprecation for additional context.
RESOURCE_CACHE_PROVIDER

不適用

n/a

以前在某些情況下需要使用 View Engine 測試 AOT 編譯的元件，但自 Ivy 以來不再需要。

This was previously necessary in some cases to test AOT-compiled components with View Engine, but is no longer since Ivy.

路由器ExtraOptions中的 relativeLinkResolution

relativeLinkResolution in the Router ExtraOptions

切換到預設的 'corrected' 連結解析方式

Switch to the default of 'corrected' link resolution

引入此選項是為了以向後相容的方式修復具有連結解析的錯誤。仍然依賴於有問題的舊版行為的現有應用程式應該切換到更正後的新行為並停止傳遞此標誌。

This option was introduced to fix a bug with link resolution in a backwards compatible way. Existing apps which still depend on the buggy legacy behavior should switch to the new corrected behavior and stop passing this flag.

RouterOutletContract.activateWith中的 resolver

resolver argument in RouterOutletContract.activateWith

不適用

n/a

ComponentFactory 和 ComponentFactoryResolver 已經棄用，不再需要傳 resolver 引數以獲取 ComponentFactory。

ComponentFactory and ComponentFactoryResolver afre deprecated, and passing an argument for a resolver to retrieve a ComponentFactory is no longer required.
OutletContext#resolver

不適用

n/a

ComponentFactory 和 ComponentFactoryResolver 已經棄用，不再需要傳 resolver 引數以獲取 ComponentFactory。

ComponentFactory and ComponentFactoryResolver are deprecated, and using a resolver to retrieve a ComponentFactory is no longer required.
SwUpdate#activated

SwUpdate#activateUpdate的返回值

Return value of SwUpdate#activateUpdate

activated 屬性已被棄用。現有用法可以遷移到SwUpdate#activateUpdate。

The activated property is deprecated. Existing usages can migrate to SwUpdate#activateUpdate.
SwUpdate#available SwUpdate#versionUpdates

SwUpdate#available的行為可以透過從SwUpdate#versionUpdates中過濾VersionReadyEvent來實現

The behavior of SwUpdate#available can be achieved by filtering for the VersionReadyEvent from SwUpdate#versionUpdates
最後複查時間： 5/31/2022
